<Text: Dwarka:  In 2011 it had a population of 38,873.>

3:

Text: Dwarka:  Dwarka is one of the foremost Chardhams, four sacred Hindu pilgrimage sites, and is one of the Sapta Puri, the seven most ancient religious cities in the country.
Triplets:<Dwarka
4:
--------------------
<Text: Dwarka:  Dwarka is often identified with the Dwarka Kingdom, the ancient kingdom of Krishna, and is believed to have been the first capital of Gujarat.>
